DataTableColumn.description: Defines the characteristics of a column in a DataTable element.

sortable.description: Specifies if the column is sortable.

width.description: Specifies the width of the column. Width represents the weight of the column relative to the other columns in the table.

cellContentAlignment.description: Controls how the content of all cells in the column is horizontally aligned by default. This value overrides the setting at the table level.

TableResponsiveConfig.description: Defines responsive configuration of data table.

width.description: Specifies the width in pixels when columns are applied.

columns.description: Specifies the list of columns that are displayed.

DataTablePaging.description: Defines paging configuration of data table.

page.description: Specifies the page value. Can be an expression from a dataset.

pageSize.description: Specifies the page size value. Can be an expression from a dataset.

totalCount.description: Specifies the total entries count. Can be an expression from a dataset.

pageSizeOptions.description: Specifies the list of available page size options.

DataTableRow.description: Provides a way to integrate with various sources and display, sort and filter data in a tabular form.

$data.description: Expression for getting the row items from the dataset

cells.description: Defines the number of columns in the table, their sizes, and more.

actions.description: Defines the actions that can be triggered on data table.

DataTableCell.description: Provides a way to integrate with various sources and display, sort and filter data in a tabular form.

value.description: Expression for getting the value from the dataset

translate.description: Specifies whether the column should be translated.

columns.description: Defines the number of columns in the table, their sizes, and more.

rows.description: Defines the number of columns in the table, their sizes, and more.

responsive.description: Defines visible columns when column width changes.

filterDialogId.description: Specifies id of the filter dialog.

stickyHeader.description: Specifies whether the header of the data table should stick to the top.
